javax.ws.rs.ext
Interface BaseContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
FilterContext, MessageBodyHandlerContext<T>, ReadFromHandlerContext<T>, WriteToHandlerContext<T>
public interface BaseContext

Base context shared by handlers and filters.

Since:
2.0
Author:
Santiago Pericas-Geertsen, Bill Burke

Method Summary
 Map<String,Object> getProperties()
          Get a mutable map of properties that can be used for communication between handlers and between filters.
 Class<?> getResourceClass()
          Get the resource class that is the target of a request.
 Method getResourceMethod()
          Get the resource method that is the target of a request.
 

Method Detail

getProperties

Map<String,Object> getProperties()
Get a mutable map of properties that can be used for communication between handlers and between filters. In the Client API, this property map is initialized by calling Configuration.getProperties() on the configuration object associated with the corresponding Invocation or Invocation.Builder instance on which a filter or handler is registered. Otherwise, it is initialized to the empty map.

Returns:
a mutable property map
See Also:
Configuration

getResourceMethod

Method getResourceMethod()
Get the resource method that is the target of a request. In the client API, this method returns null.

Returns:
resource method or null
See Also:
getResourceClass()

getResourceClass

Class<?> getResourceClass()
Get the resource class that is the target of a request. In the Client API, this method returns null.

Returns:
resource class or null
See Also:
getResourceMethod()
